meanings.definition: A piece of work to be done or undertaken.
meanings.sent1: My teacher gave me a task to complete over the weekend.
meanings.sent2: Finishing my homework is a daily task for me.
meanings.sent3: I tried to juggle too many tasks at once and ended up forgetting some.
meanings.sent4: The task of climbing the mountain seemed impossible at first.
meanings.sent5: The task of cleaning the entire house felt overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: Walking the dog is my favorite task in the morning.
meanings.sent2: It is my task to make sure all the lights are turned off before bed.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks her only task is to nap all day.
meanings.sent4: The task of being the class monitor comes with great responsibility.
meanings.sent5: Completing the project on time was a challenging task.

meanings.definition: To assign a task to someone.
meanings.sent1: I will task you with organizing the files by the end of the day.
meanings.sent2: She tasked me with finding a suitable venue for the event.
meanings.sent3: The teacher decided to task the students with a surprise quiz.
meanings.sent4: The manager tasked the team with coming up with a new marketing strategy.
meanings.sent5: He tasked himself with learning a new language in just one month.
